titleStmt.title: A short inuentory of certayne idle inuentions the fruites of a close and secret garden of great ease, and litle pleasure. By C.T.
titleStmt.author: Thimelthorpe, C.

notesStmt.note: "The compositor to the auctour", on L2v, calls the author "Thimelthorpe".
Reproduction of a photostat of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
